summary: ray vega , 33 , was arrested a day after the september 5 robbery and has been charged with robbery and conspiracy .   vega is the suspected boyfriend of bank manager aurora barrera according to local reports .   barrera was strapped with a fake bomb and forced to empty her bank of america branch 's safe .   vega has been released on $ 100,000 bail .
